message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12000.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a better price for it. I'll sell it to you for $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12500.
I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'll give you a slight concession, but I still need to make a profit. I'll sell it to you for $14000.
I understand your position, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13000.
You're really pushing me to my limits, Bob! I'll give you one more chance, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'll sell it to you for $14500.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering my financial situation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13500.
I'm not giving up yet, Bob! I'll make one last push to get the price I want. I'll sell it to you for $14750.
I respect your determination, Alice. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $14000.
